2409.06122.title: Case Study: Leveraging GenAI to Build AI-based Surrogates and Regressors for Modeling Radio Frequency Heating in Fusion Energy Science
2409.06122.paper_summary:
This work presents a detailed case study on using Generative AI (GenAI) to
develop AI surrogates for simulation models in fusion energy research. The
scope includes the methodology, implementation, and results of using GenAI to
assist in model development and optimization, comparing these results with
previous manually developed models.
2409.06122.paper_summary_zh: 這項工作提供了一個詳細的案例研究，探討使用生成式 AI (GenAI) 來為融合能源研究中的模擬模型開發 AI 代理。範圍包括使用 GenAI 協助模型開發和最佳化的方法、實施和結果，並將這些結果與先前手動開發的模型進行比較。
2409.06122.author: E. Wes Bethel et.al.
2409.06122.authors: E. Wes Bethel, Vianna Cramer, Alexander del Rio, Lothar Narins, Chris Pestano, Satvik Verma, Erick Arias, Nicola Bertelli, Talita Perciano, Syun'ichi Shiraiwa, Álvaro Sánchez Villar, Greg Wallace, John C. Wright
